QuestData.Title: Mementos of the Fallen
QuestData.Description: There were so many of them. The guards couldn't stop them... nobody could stop them. So many souls stripped of their bodies by those savages.$b$bWe must not forget those that gave their lives to try and defend Nethergarde. Please, if you find any mementos of the fallen, bring them back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Strumner's Sword, Keri's Mug, and Krolan's Shield.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. These mementos will forever remind us of the day we lost so many of our loved ones.
